attr.title: Destructivator
attr.desc:
Destructivator is a retro styled platform shooter for the gamer that enjoys a challenge - 20 levels of fast and furious arcade action. Blast your way to Zallagor's lair to rid the world of this evil monster, blah blah blah etc...

Basically just shoot all the bad guys.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://pugfuglygames.itch.io/destructivator and place the contents of the zip into the /gamedata folder
